Seattle-San Diego-10-1701030395932.title: Seattle to San Diego in 10 days

activities.description: Visit the iconic Space Needle and enjoy panoramic city views
Explore the bustling market known for fresh seafood and crafts
Immerse yourself in a diverse collection of art and exhibitions
Take a guided tour beneath the streets to learn about the history
Visit the stunning glass sculptures and gardens by Dale Chihuly
Enjoy outdoor sculptures and stunning waterfront views
Explore the history of aviation and see unique aircraft
Relax in this unique park with great views of the city
Sample locally brewed beers and enjoy pub food

details.info: Experience the vibrant allure of Seattle, a city where stunning natural beauty meets urban sophistication. Immerse yourself in the lush green landscapes, surrounded by the majestic Cascade and Olympic Mountains. Explore iconic attractions like the Space Needle and Pike Place Market. Savor the renowned coffee culture and indulge in delicious Pacific Northwest cuisine. Immerse in the thriving arts scene and catch a show at the historic theaters. Embrace the city's drizzly yet mild weather, perfect for strolling through charming neighborhoods and admiring the breathtaking waterfront views. Seattle is a city that promises to captivate your senses and leave you yearning for more.

activities.description: Wander around the trendy Pearl District and visit local boutiques and cafes
Explore the park, visit the rose garden and the zoo
Sample the diverse food truck scene in Portland

activities.activity: Oregon Museum of Science and Industry
activities.description: Explore the interactive exhibits and planetarium

details.info: Portland - where urban charm meets natural beauty. Wander through its streets lined with eclectic shops, vibrant murals, and coffeehouses on every corner. Immerse yourself in the lush landscapes of the Pacific Northwest, hike in verdant forests, or cycle along the sparkling Willamette River. Indulge in the city's renowned food scene, from food trucks to farm-to-table eateries. Don't forget your umbrella - Portland's mild, rainy weather adds a touch of magic to this enchanting city. Discover why Portland is called the "City of Roses" - a captivating destination that blooms with endless possibilities.

activities.description: Visit the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and take memorable photos
Take a tour to the famous Alcatraz Island
Indulge in delicious chocolates at Ghirardelli Square
Explore the interactive exhibits at the Exploratorium Museum
Spend time relaxing and exploring the beautiful Golden Gate Park
Explore the food and artisan shops at the Ferry Building Marketplace

details.info: San Francisco: an enchanting blend of natural beauty and urban vibrance. Iconic rolling hills meet the glittering waters of the Pacific, while cable cars traverse charming streets lined with Victorian houses. Explore the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, immerse in diverse neighborhoods like Chinatown and the Mission District, and savor culinary delights. Experience fog-kissed mornings and sunny afternoons. From stunning vistas to cultural experiences, this city captivates all who wander its eclectic streets. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in "The City by the Bay."

activities.description: Explore the aircraft carrier turned museum in the San Diego Harbor
Stroll along the waterfront, shop, and enjoy street performances
Experience the vibrant nightlife, restaurants, and live music scene
Spend the day exploring one of the largest and renowned zoos
Visit museums, gardens, and enjoy outdoor activities

activities.activity: Old Town San Diego State Historic Park
activities.description: Step back in time and explore the birthplace of California
Relax at the beach or explore tide pools and sea caves
Hike along the coastal cliffs and enjoy stunning views
Experience the charm of this neighborhood known for its food and culture

details.info: Donning California's sun-kissed embrace, San Diego epitomizes coastal allure. Feel the warm sand beneath your feet as shimmering waves crash. Discover vibrant neighborhoods, from the Gaslamp Quarter's bustling nightlife to the tranquility of La Jolla's seaside cliffs. Dive into world-class museums and embrace the wild at the renowned San Diego Zoo. With a blissful Mediterranean climate, indulge in outdoor adventures year-round. San Diego beckons, offering endless beauty and boundless excitement.

activities.description: Visit the stunning cliffs and enjoy breathtaking views
Explore the medieval castle and learn about its history
Experience live traditional music at a local pub
Discover the beautiful park, go hiking and see the castle
Take a tour of a local craft brewery and sample their beers
Enjoy a boat tour and admire the scenic beauty of the bay
Explore the craft workshops and shop for unique souvenirs
Visit a Donegal Tweed shop and learn about traditional weaving

details.info: Experience the enchantment of Donegal city, nestled on Ireland's rugged northwest coast. Picture ageless castles overlooking sparkling blue fjords and sweeping golden beaches. Immerse yourself in traditional Irish culture, exploring quaint pubs and admiring vibrant street art. Discover the majestic Slieve League cliffs and hike through mystical, untouched landscapes. Unpredictable weather adds drama, with misty rainbows hanging over the emerald-green hills. Donegal is a captivating destination for adventurers seeking timeless beauty.

activities.description: Take a tour to the famous Cliffs of Moher and enjoy breathtaking views
Visit the stunning Galway Cathedral and learn about its history
Experience traditional Irish music in one of Galway's pubs
Take a boat tour to the beautiful Aran Islands and explore the Irish countryside
Discover the history and culture of Galway at the city museum
Indulge in a guided food tour, tasting local delicacies in Galway
Enjoy the vibrant Galway Arts Festival, featuring music, theater, and art
Stroll down Galway's famous Shop Street and explore local shops

details.info: Discover the lively charm of Galway City, Ireland's cultural gem. Stroll down cobblestone streets adorned with colorful storefronts, cafes, and musicians serenading passersby. Embrace the stunning coastal views and the bustling Latin Quarter. Immerse yourself in traditional music sessions and indulge in fresh seafood delights. With a year-round bohemian vibe and spirited festivals, Galway offers a vibrant atmosphere that captivates all. Unpredictable weather adds an element of adventure to your journey. Let Galway's enchantment embrace you!

activities.description: Visit the iconic Blarney Castle and kiss the stone
Explore the vibrant English Market
Take a tour of the historical Cork City Gaol
Visit the Blackrock Castle Observatory
Take a guided walking tour of Cork City
Explore Fota Wildlife Park
Discover Cork's history at the Public Museum
Visit Nano Nagle Place, a cultural and heritage hub

details.info: Discover Cork, where old-world charm meets vibrant modernity. Stroll along the colorful, winding streets lined with traditional Irish pubs and charming shops. Immerse yourself in the rich history of this thriving city, from the grandeur of St. Fin Barre's Cathedral to the ancient stone walls of Cork City Gaol. Explore the buzzing English Market, a haven for food lovers. Surrounding Cork, picturesque landscapes unfold, beckoning you to hike along rugged coastlines and cruise down serene waterways. Embrace the warmth of the locals as you enjoy traditional music sessions and indulge in delectable local cuisine. With a maritime climate, expect mild temperatures year-round. Cork city invites you to experience its vibrant energy and captivating beauty.

activities.description: Explore the historical Charles Fort, a 17th-century star-shaped fort
Take a leisurely walk around Kinsale and learn about its heritage
Take a guided food tour and sample local delicacies

details.info: Discover Kinsale, a picturesque gem on Ireland's southern coast. Immerse yourself in its vibrant colors, from the charming colorful houses to the stunning turquoise harbor. Indulge in delectable seafood, explore historic forts, and stroll along narrow streets buzzing with lively pubs. Surrounded by breathtaking landscapes and nestled between rolling hills, Kinsale enjoys mild winters and blissful summers. Welcome to a city that encapsulates Ireland's beauty, history, and culinary delights in one captivating destination.

Santander-Santiago de Compostela-12-1701.title: Santander to Santiago de Compostela in 12 days

activities.description: Visit the stunning Magdalena Palace and its gardens
Explore the beautiful Santander Cathedral
Take a leisurely walk along the scenic Paseo Pereda
Discover the maritime history at the Maritime Museum
Relax and soak up the sun at the popular Sardinero Beach
Take a boat tour along the Santander Bay
Visit the local market for fresh produce and seafood
Explore the contemporary art at the Centro Botín
Wander through the vibrant Barrio Pesquero neighborhood

details.info: Santander: A coastal gem nestled in northern Spain's Cantabria region. Enchanting beaches, framed by rugged cliffs and turquoise waters, captivate the senses. Stroll along the elegant Promenade, visit the bustling Fisherman's Quarter, or explore the historic Magdalena Peninsula. Mild summers and mild winters make it perfect for outdoor adventures, while its vibrant culture tempts with local festivals and delicious cuisine. Discover Santander's beauty and be swept away by its charm.

activities.description: Visit the historic Oviedo Cathedral and its beautiful art
Explore the ancient San Miguel de Lillo church
Discover the Preromanesque architectural heritage
Take a leisurely stroll in the picturesque city park

activities.activity: Museo de Bellas Artes de Asturias
activities.description: Visit the Museum of Fine Arts showcasing local artworks
Enjoy a traditional Asturian cider and tapas experience

details.info: Discover the urban gem of Oviedo! Nestled in the heart of Asturias, this Spanish city is a treasure trove of elegance and history. Marvel at its stunning architecture, lush parks, and charming cobblestone streets. Immerse yourself in art and culture at its world-class museums and theaters. Venture into the breathtaking countryside for hiking and explore nearby coastal towns. Oviedo's mild climate makes it perfect for year-round exploration. Uncover the enchantment of Oviedo and let it captivate your soul.

activities.description: Visit the stunning Lugo Cathedral
Explore the Roman walls that surround the city
Indulge in a culinary experience and try local tapas
Take part in the annual San Froilan Festival
Visit the Provincial Museum of Lugo
Discover the mosaic house and its beautiful designs
Relax and rejuvenate in the tranquil thermal baths
Explore the shops and boutiques in the city center

details.info: Immerse yourself in the enchanting beauty of Lugo! This Spanish gem embraces ancient Roman history with its intact city walls, creating a surreal atmosphere. Lose yourself in its charming cobbled streets, adorned with picturesque squares and architecture. Surrounding natural wonders beckon hikers, while the lively tapas scene invites food lovers to indulge. Enjoy the Mediterranean climate and bask in the warmth of Lugo's rich cultural heritage. A captivating destination that will steal your heart!

activities.description: Explore the famous Santiago de Compostela Cathedral
Take a guided walking tour of the historic old town
Experience the delicious local Galician cuisine
Learn about the history of the pilgrimage to Santiago de Compostela
Stroll through the local market and shop for fresh produce and local products
Sample a variety of tapas in different bars and experience the lively nightlife of Santiago de Compostela

details.info: Immerse yourself in the captivating charm of Santiago de Compostela. This UNESCO World Heritage city boasts awe-inspiring Gothic architecture, enchanting medieval streets, and vibrant plazas. Marvel at the majestic Santiago Cathedral, explore the quaint Old Town, and savor delicious Galician cuisine. Surrounded by lush green hills and picturesque landscapes, it's the perfect gateway to the mesmerizing Galician countryside. Don't miss out on the exhilarating experience of walking the historic Camino de Santiago pilgrimage route. With a mild maritime climate, Santiago de Compostela welcomes you with open arms year-round.

activities.description: Visit the famous shell-shaped square in the heart of Siena, known for its stunning architecture and the Palazzo Pubblico with its towering Torre del Mangia.
Explore the magnificent Siena Cathedral, a masterpiece of Gothic architecture, with its stunning facade, intricate mosaics, and breathtaking interior.
Witness the thrilling horse race that takes place in Piazza del Campo twice a year, on July 2 and August 16, and experience the vibrant atmosphere of this event.
Take a day trip to the nearby medieval hill town of San Gimignano, known for its well-preserved towers, charming streets, and panoramic views of the countryside.
Learn the art of Tuscan cuisine in a hands-on cooking class, where you'll prepare traditional dishes and enjoy a delicious meal paired with local wines.
Embark on a scenic wine tour through the beautiful Chianti region, visit local vineyards, and taste world-renowned Tuscan wines.
Discover the treasures of the Siena Duomo Museum, which houses a priceless collection of religious art, including sculptures by Donatello and Duccio di Buoninsegna.
Visit the historic Palazzo Salimbeni, home to the Monte dei Paschi di Siena, one of the oldest banks in the world, and admire its impressive Renaissance architecture.

details.info: Discover the mesmerizing Italian gem of Siena. Immerse yourself in the splendid Gothic architecture, enchanting narrow streets, and the iconic Piazza del Campo. Lose yourself in the breathtaking Tuscan countryside, rich vineyards, and rolling hills. Experience the exhilarating Palio horse race, indulge in sumptuous local cuisine, and savor world-class wine. With warm summers and mild winters, Siena is a year-round delight. Unveil the beauty and charm of this captivating city that will leave you spellbound.

activities.description: Explore the world-renowned Uffizi Gallery and its art masterpieces
Walk on the historic Ponte Vecchio bridge and admire the jewelry shops
Taste delicious gelato at one of the famous gelaterias in Florence
Visit the iconic Florence Cathedral, known as Duomo di Firenze
Explore the grand Pitti Palace and its stunning art collections
Enjoy a breathtaking sunset view over Florence from Piazzale Michelangelo

details.info: Florence, Italy's Renaissance gem, captivates with its timeless beauty. The city exudes charm through its exquisite art and architecture, like the iconic Duomo and the Uffizi Gallery. Stroll along the Arno River, visit the captivating Ponte Vecchio, or indulge in delicious gelato. Immerse yourself in history at the Basilica of Santa Croce. With a mild Mediterranean climate, Florence welcomes year-round exploration. Discover the enchantment of Florence, where every corner reveals another masterpiece waiting to be admired.

activities.description: Visit the main square of Bologna and admire the architecture and the Neptune Fountain
Explore the largest church in Bologna, known for its stunning interior and beautiful artwork
Take a guided walking tour to taste local specialties, such as tortellini and mortadella
Visit this iconic leaning tower and enjoy panoramic views of the city from the top
Discover contemporary art at the Museum of Modern Art in Bologna
Learn the art of making traditional Italian gelato in a hands-on workshop

details.info: Immerse yourself in the vibrant beauty of Bologna! This Italian gem captivates with its medieval architecture, terracotta rooftops, and charming porticoes. Wander through ancient narrow streets, relishing in the aroma of authentic pasta nearby. With its proximity to the stunning Emilia-Romagna countryside, indulge in wine tasting and cycling adventures. Bask in Bologna's cultural fervor with visits to its art-filled museums and historic Piazza Maggiore. Don't forget to savor its savory gastronomy, from rich ragu to mouthwatering mortadella. Bologna beckons you with its warm Mediterranean climate, perfect for strolling and sipping espresso at outdoor cafes. Gli amanti di Italia, Bologna awaits!

activities.description: Visit St. Mark's Square, the heart of Venice, and admire its beauty
Take a romantic gondola ride through the enchanting canals of Venice
Explore the vibrant Rialto Market and indulge in local flavors
Visit the Doge's Palace, a symbol of Venetian power and history
Take a boat trip to the colorful island of Burano
Participate in a workshop and make your own Venetian mask

details.info: Venice, the stunning floating city, captivates with its labyrinth of picturesque canals and ornate Renaissance architecture. Gondola rides beneath arched bridges and palaces are customary, while St. Mark's Square offers a vibrant energy. Lose yourself in the enchanting alleys and discover hidden gems filled with artistic treasures. Enjoy Venetian cuisine and indulge in Venetian masks during Carnevale. With sunny summers and mild winters, wandering this dreamy destination is a year-round delight. Venice awaits, promising an unforgettable escapade.

activities.description: Explore the largest ancient castle in the world, with stunning architecture
Walk across the iconic medieval bridge, adorned with statues
Visit the historic square with its gorgeous Old Town Hall and Astronomical Clock
Witness the famous astronomical clock chime the hour
Explore the rich Jewish history and visit the Old Jewish Cemetery
Experience the local beer culture with a guided tasting
Enjoy a scenic boat ride on the Vltava River, admiring Prague's skyline
Visit the largest museum in Czechia, showcasing art and history
Discover traditional Czech cuisine and local food markets

details.info: Prague, a mesmerizing city of Gothic wonders, exudes enchantment at every turn. Stroll through cobblestone streets, overshadowed by majestic castles and ornate cathedrals. Meet centuries-old ghosts hidden in its medieval alleys. Immerse yourself in its rich cultural scene, savoring hearty Czech cuisine and sipping world-renowned beer. Enjoy vibrant entertainment on the Charles Bridge and witness the breathtaking Prague Castle illuminate under starry skies. With mild summers and snowy winters, Prague boasts beauty in every season. Discover the magical allure of this Bohemian gem!

activities.description: Explore the beautiful palace and its gardens
Visit the iconic cathedral in the heart of the city
Wander through the bustling market, try local cuisine
Admire the stunning architecture and art collection
Attend a performance or take a backstage tour
Ride the famous Ferris wheel and enjoy the amusement
Visit the imperial residence and museums
Spend a day exploring one of the world's oldest zoos
Enjoy shopping in Vienna's longest shopping street

details.info: Vienna, Austria: A mesmerizing blend of imperial grandeur and artistic flair. Admire the opulent palaces, ornate cathedrals, and charming café culture. Stroll along the Danube River, lose yourself in the captivating music scene, and immerse in the world of Klimt and Schiele. Indulge in Viennese delicacies like Sachertorte and Wiener schnitzel. Experience the four distinct seasons, from Christmas magic to summer concerts in picturesque gardens. Deeply sophisticated, Vienna beckons with its timeless elegance and cultural treasures.

activities.description: Visit Bratislava Castle for panoramic city views
Explore the charming streets of Bratislava Old Town
Take a trip to Devin Castle, located on a hilltop
Visit the Slovak National Museum for a cultural experience
Enjoy a relaxing cruise along the Danube River
Take in the panoramic views from the UFO Observation Deck
Explore the collection of Slovak art at the Slovak National Gallery
Visit the historic St. Martin's Cathedral
Spend some time with the animals at Bratislava Zoo

details.info: Welcome to Bratislava, a charming city nestled on the banks of the Danube River. Immerse yourself in its rich history and stunning architecture, with a picturesque Old Town brimming with cobblestone streets and medieval charm. Surrounding the city are verdant vineyards and rolling hills, perfect for hiking or cycling. Indulge in typical activities like tasting local wines and sampling delicious Slovak cuisine. Spring and autumn offer mild weather, while summer brings warmth and outdoor festivals. Discover the vibrant soul of Bratislava and create memories that will last a lifetime.

activities.description: Visit the iconic Parliament Building
Explore the historical Buda Castle and its surroundings
Relax at one of the largest thermal baths in Europe
Attend a performance or take a guided tour
Shop for local produce and souvenirs
Take a guided tour of the Hungarian Parliament
Enjoy a scenic cruise along the Danube River
Experience Budapest's unique nightlife
Learn to cook traditional Hungarian dishes

details.info: Budapest, a jewel of Eastern Europe, stuns with its grandeur. Gaze at the breathtaking Danube River cutting through its historic architecture, including the iconic Chain Bridge. Embrace the city's thermal baths, revel in its vibrant nightlife, and feast on delicious Hungarian cuisine. With sunny summers and winter wonderlands, Budapest beckons all year. Let its blend of old-world charm and modern flair captivate you. Dive into this enchanting city and unlock a world of unmatched beauty and intrigue. Budapest awaits your discovery!

activities.description: Visit the iconic Calgary Tower and enjoy panoramic views of the city
Explore the diverse collection of art and artifacts at Glenbow Museum

activities.activity: River Walk and Prince's Island Park
activities.description: Take a leisurely stroll along the river and enjoy the beautiful park
Step back in time and experience life in 19th-century Western Canada
Visit the Calgary Zoo and see a wide variety of animals from around the world
Explore the vibrant Stephen Avenue Walk, lined with shops and cafes
Discover the legacy of the 1988 Winter Olympics at Canada Olympic Park

activities.activity: Studio Bell, home of the National Music Centre
activities.description: Immerse yourself in Canada's music history at Studio Bell, home of the National Music Centre
Take a peaceful walk in the Inglewood Bird Sanctuary and observe a variety of bird species

details.info: Calgary: Where urban meets nature in spectacular harmony. Immerse yourself amidst the gleaming skyline, nestled against the majestic Rocky Mountains. Unleash your adventurous spirit with hiking, skiing, and white-water rafting. Immerse in the vibrant arts scene, savor local culinary delights, and indulge in shopping sprees. Engage in lively Stampede festivities or explore the captivating Glenbow Museum. With sunny summers and cozy winters, Calgary's captivating contrasts await your exploration.

activities.description: Hike up Tunnel Mountain and enjoy breathtaking views of Banff
Explore the natural history of the Canadian Rockies at this museum
Stroll along Banff Avenue and shop for souvenirs and local products
Take a scenic boat cruise on the largest lake in Banff National Park
Relax in the mineral-rich hot springs with stunning mountain views
Enjoy a peaceful walk or bike ride along the beautiful Vermilion Lakes
Take the gondola ride to the top of Sulphur Mountain for panoramic views
Hike along the scenic Johnston Canyon and see stunning waterfalls
Learn about the history and culture of the indigenous people of the Canadian Rockies

details.info: Nestled in the heart of the Canadian Rockies, Banff epitomizes natural beauty. Majestic mountains, turquoise lakes, and lush forests surround this alpine paradise. Experience thrilling outdoor adventures like hiking, skiing, and wildlife spotting. Capture breathtaking views of the Banff National Park. Immerse yourself in the charming town, offering cozy restaurants, boutique shops, and a vibrant arts scene. Discover the magic of Banff's four distinct seasons, from snowy wonderland winters to vibrant autumn landscapes. Let Banff's enchantment ignite your wanderlust.

activities.description: Kayak on the stunning Lake Louise and take in the breathtaking scenery
Enjoy a horseback ride through beautiful trails in the surrounding area
Indulge in a delightful meal at the iconic Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise
Embark on a full day hike to Moraine Lake, known for its captivating beauty
Hike to the charming Lake Agnes Tea House and savor a cup of tea in a serene setting
Discover the stunning Victoria Glacier and enjoy panoramic views from the Lake Louise Gondola

details.info: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Lake Louise! Set against the stunning backdrop of the Canadian Rockies, this pristine alpine paradise is a visual feast for the soul. Immerse yourself in nature's symphony of turquoise waters, towering snow-capped peaks, and lush evergreen forests. Enjoy hiking, canoeing, and skiing in this outdoor playground. Don't miss the iconic Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise, exuding timeless elegance. With a mild summer and snowy winters, Lake Louise offers something extraordinary in every season. Embrace the magic of this enchanting destination!

activities.description: Explore the Kamloops Heritage railway and learn about history
Visit the beautiful Riverside Park and enjoy a picnic
Visit a local winery and indulge in wine tasting
Go for a wildlife viewing tour at the Kamloops Wildlife Park
Explore the Farmers Market and taste local produce

details.info: Nestled between rugged mountains and picturesque lakes, Kamloops is a visual delight. Experience thrilling outdoor adventures like hiking, biking, and fishing amidst breathtaking landscapes. Explore its vibrant art scene, indulge in local cuisine, or unwind at award-winning wineries. With over 2,000 hours of sunshine, Kamloops offers year-round enjoyment. Immerse yourself in this dynamic city where stunning natural beauty meets diverse cultural experiences.

activities.description: Enjoy skiing or snowboarding at one of the top resorts
Take a scenic ride on the world's longest gondola
Relax and rejuvenate at this tranquil spa
Explore the shops, restaurants, and entertainment
Embark on an exhilarating off-road ATV adventure

details.info: Whistler: A picturesque sanctuary nestled amidst British Columbia's majestic mountains. Be enchanted by its stunning alpine beauty, towering evergreens, and glistening lakes. Indulge in world-class skiing, hiking, and mountain biking. Immerse yourself in vibrant village life with charming shops, delectable dining, and lively nightlife. Embrace year-round adventure and embrace the thrill of this breathtaking wonderland.

activities.description: Explore the scenic Stanley Park and its attractions
Visit the public market and enjoy local cuisine
Walk across the stunning suspension bridge

details.info: Immerse in Vancouver's stunning beauty, nestled between the Pacific Ocean and snow-capped mountains. Stroll through lush Stanley Park, embrace vibrant city life, and indulge in diverse cuisine. Kayak in English Bay, ski on Grouse Mountain, or hop on a bike along the seawall. Mild, oceanic weather beckons year-round. Vancouver, where nature and urban living harmoniously coexist, awaits your adventurous spirit.
